name: What is Death? (Ethn_Studios)
description:
You are an immortal being.  After being immortal for so long,  (178 years) people start... disappearing. You wish to learn what happened to them. And after you do, you find a vessel, and become mortal. But at what cost?

Please read below:

The theme of the jam was "The Secret Of Life", so I decided to make a game where you are immortal. Everyone is dying, and you want tp know what it's like to die. In this case, the secret is not something IN life, but the secret IS life itself! 

What is Death is a submission to the Summer Break Game Jam. The challenge was to make this in a week. How did it turn out? Find that out for yourself...
